instruction: You are given a dialog between 2 or more individuals. Within the dialog, there will be clues as to the names of the speakers. You will be asked at the end of the dialog to identify the name of one of the speakers.
input:
Speaker 1: Hey!

Speaker 5: Ohhh! 
Speaker 3: I mean they're trying to do everything they can to make me quit, and if there were any other job, I would. But this is something I've been waiting for my whole life. 
Speaker 4: Well, wait a minute, you're the boss! Why don't you just yell at them? Or, fire them? 
Speaker 3: I would love too, but I can't! I mean I just can't, you know that I'm not good at confrontation. 
Speaker 6: Hey, you know what you can do? I remember reading about this director, I think it was Orson Wells, who at the beginning of the movie would hire somebody, just so he could fire them in front of everybody. Then they would all know, who's boss. 
Speaker 5: Hey, Mon! I'm not doing anything, why don't you fire me? 
Speaker 3: That's a good idea! Wait, do you know how to waiter? 
Speaker 5: Good enough to get fired. 
Speaker 3: All right, you're hired!

Speaker 3?
